metadata.title: CVE-2024-27399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: l2cap: fix null-ptr-deref in l2cap_chan_timeoutThere is a race condition between l2cap_chan_timeout() andl2cap_chan_del(). When we use l2cap_chan_del() to delete thechannel, the chan->conn will be set to null. But the conn couldbe dereferenced again in the mutex_lock() of l2cap_chan_timeout().As a result the null pointer dereference bug will happen.
